price: Edhe para tyre ka përgënjeshtruar populli i Nuhut, fisi Ad dhe Faraoni - njeriu i hunjve (ku torturonte njerëzit),
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
